title: Businessweek Extra - Jon Wertheim
itunes:title: Businessweek Extra - Jon Wertheim
description:
Hosted by Carol Massar and Jason Kelly.


Featuring a conversation with Jon Wertheim, Executive Editor for Sports Illustrated, on the changing landscape in sports amid the coronavirus outbreak

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
